svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-09-26T04:12:20.014Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/116.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="bIfRo8OJAgTB-QfSx0YN" version="21.8.0" type="github"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="oxKfJkmYpGRvuMPZPJQF"> <mxGraphModel dx="1509" dy="798" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="827" background="#ffffff" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-1" value="<font face="Helvetica" style="font-size: 15px;">第一阶段：ServiceManager启动</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#82b366;fillColor=#d5e8d4;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;rounded=1;glass=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="43" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;hachureGap=4;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" parent="1" source="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-2" target="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-9" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-2" value="<font style="font-size: 15px;" face="Helvetica">&nbsp;bs = <font color="#ff3333">binder_open</font>(driver, 128*1024);</font>" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;hachureGap=4;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="90" width="310" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-3" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;" face="Helvetica">driver：binder驱动；</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="20" width="170" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-5" value="<font face="Helvetica"><span style="font-size: 16px;">serviceManager使用mmap映射的<br>内存为<font color="#ff3333">128</font>k；</span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="49" width="256" height="62" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-6" value="<font style="font-size: 15px;" face="Helvetica">ServiceManager 调用 open() 函数，打开 <br>Binder 驱动，而后调用 mmap() 完成内存<br>的申请与映射;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="100" width="300" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-4" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;" face="Helvetica">driver：binder驱动</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="390" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-18" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;hachureGap=4;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" parent="1" source="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-9" target="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-9" value="<font style="font-size: 15px;" face="Helvetica">&nbsp;<font color="#ff3333">binder_become_context_manager</font>(bs);</font>" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;hachureGap=4;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="90" width="304" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-12" value="<font style="font-size: 15px;" face="Helvetica">通过 ioctl 将当前线程注册为 <br>contextmanager;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-9" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="90" width="210" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-14" value="<font face="Helvetica"><span style="font-size: 15px;">bs：binder_open返回来的binder状态值</span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-9" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="52" width="279" height="37" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-15" value="<font style="font-size: 15px;" face="Helvetica">&nbsp;<font color="#ff3333">binder_loop</font>(bs,svcmgr_handler);</font>" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;hachureGap=4;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="810" y="90" width="330" height="192" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-16" value="<font style="font-size: 15px;" face="Helvetica"><span style="">进入循环，调用ioctl函数等待接受数据，进入<br></span>阻塞睡眠状态,<font color="#ff3333">binder_parse</font>解析收到的数据并<br>处理；</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-15" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="108" width="320" height="84" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-17" value="<font face="Helvetica"><span style="font-size: 15px;">bs：binder_open返回来的binder状态值</span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-15" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="32" width="279" height="37" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-19" value="<font face="Helvetica"><span style="font-size: 15px;">svcmgr_handler：一个函数指针，是远程<br>调用的回调函数；<br></span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" parent="qZQYzfmrP5tyafOAC0hR-15" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="60" width="300" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

font.span:
serviceManager使用mmap映射的
内存为128k；

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

switch.text: ServiceManager 调用 open() 函数，打开...

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
通过 ioctl 将当前线程注册为
contextmanager;

switch.text: 通过 ioctl 将当前线程注册为...

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
进入循环，调用ioctl函数等待接受数据，进入
阻塞睡眠状态,binder_parse解析收到的数据并
处理；

switch.text: 进入循环，调用ioctl函数等待接受数据，进入...

font.span:
svcmgr_handler：一个函数指针，是远程
调用的回调函数；
